sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 10 cm and a height of 8 cm. Find the area of the parallelogram in square centimeters.
message_2:
To find the area of a parallelogram, you can use the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 10 cm and the height is 8 cm. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 10 cm × 8 cm = 80 square centimeters
